title: Bulova Men's Marine Star Gold Chronograph Stainless Steel Watch, Black Dial Style: 98B406
descriptions:
Introducing the Bulova Men's Marine Star Gold Chronograph Stainless Steel Watch - a true masterpiece of timekeeping and style. With a style number that speaks for itself, 98B406, this watch is a must-have for any discerning collector.

As part of the prestigious Marine Star collection, this watch boasts a 6-hand chronograph and calendar, making it both a functional and fashionable accessory. The case is crafted from gold-tone stainless steel, adding a touch of luxury to its design. The black unidirectional timing bezel, complete with gold-tone accents, not only looks stunning but also serves a practical purpose.

The dial, a black sunburst with gold-tone and silver-tone accents, is protected by a domed mineral crystal, ensuring durability and clarity. The hands and markers are luminescent, making it easy to read in any light conditions.

This watch is also equipped with a range of functions, including a chronograph, 24-hour display, and calendar, making it a versatile timepiece for any occasion. The bracelet, made from gold-tone stainless steel, features curved and faceted links for a comfortable and stylish fit. The bracelet is completed with a sport foldover closure, ensuring a secure fit on your wrist.

With a water resistance of up to 100 meters, this watch is not just a pretty face - it's built to withstand the elements. Whether you're a seasoned watch collector or simply looking for a reliable and stylish timepiece, the Bulova Men's Marine Star Gold Chronograph Stainless Steel Watch is an excellent choice.
